controller

Class ServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ServerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serverable

    public class ServerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Serverable
    The controller of the server side. Gets the Model and the View and handles them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServerController.ClientThread
      The main class where the main client handling happens.
      class  ServerController.ServerThread
      Server thread will listen to every socket that asks to connect, he will accept it while the server is running.

      • unicast

        public void unicast(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.String toUser)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the sending of a unicast message to a specified user. Search for the targeted client name, send message and breaking from loop.
        Specified by:
        unicast in interface Serverable
        Parameters:
        name - sender
        message - text to be send
        toUser - target
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String message)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the sending of a broadcast message to all users. Runs on every client thread and sends the message.
        Specified by:
        broadcast in interface Serverable
        Parameters:
        name - sender
        message - text to be sent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs

      • stopServerClients

        public void stopServerClients()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Send SERVERCLOSED message to every client, tell them them to disconnect, then the server closes connection from his side in the while loop in every thread. After the loop, server will stop recieving sockets by calling the stopReceivingSockets() method.
        Specified by:
        stopServerClients in interface Serverable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs

      • log

        text - to be printed

      • notifyClientsListChanged

        private void notifyClientsListChanged()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Send GETUSERS message to every client. Calls when client list have changed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - whne connection error occurs

      • getActiveClientNames

        private java.lang.String[] getActiveClientNames()

        Returns:
        array of current active client names
